<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Reminder of the Greater Fear](/Feats.aspx?ID=3336) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=326" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 65</row>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7); [Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083)

**Trigger**
Another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you would gain the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition.

</column>

---

You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear. Reduce the value of the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition the creature would take by 1.
name: Reminder of the Greater Fear
